descriptionPoints: Working as a full-stack engineer on enterprise-scale web applications.
Building robust backend services with Java and Spring Boot.
Developing dynamic and responsive UIs using React.
Utilizing CI/CD pipelines with Jenkins and GitHub Actions to ensure reliable deployments.
Collaborating with cross-functional teams in Agile environment to deliver high-quality features.
Containerizing services using Docker for microservices architecture.
Contributed as a full-stack developer to internal product teams.
Maintained and enhanced systems built using React, Java, and Spring Boot.
Wrote efficient database queries and managed schemas in PostgreSQL.
Worked with distributed systems using Kafka and containerized workloads with Docker and Kubernetes.
Took ownership of components across front-end and back-end, delivering end-to-end features.
Participated in code reviews and collaborated within Agile teams to meet sprint goals.
Joined Sky as a graduate software engineer after completing BSc in Computer Science.
Worked across multiple teams on both frontend and backend services.
Contributed to system designs and code quality improvements.
Enhanced skills in production support, automated testing, and DevOps practices.
Built REST APIs and implemented unit/integration tests for microservices.
Provided excellent customer service in a fast-paced retail environment.
Handled transactions and stock replenishment efficiently.
Gained experience in teamwork, communication, and managing customer queries.
Managed checkout operations with attention to accuracy and customer experience.
Demonstrated reliability, punctuality, and professionalism on shift.
Learned to multitask effectively and handle busy periods with composure.
